long_description: welcome in its italia. its italia s.p.a. has been active in italian and european industries for more than 20 years, developing customized solutions for precision mechanical components. we operate in the market by proposing customized solutions for precision mechanical components. we are a flexible company with an extensive range of services that allow us to offer valuable support to our clients, addressing their diverse needs and urgencies throughout the design and management phases of industrial projects. our proven experience combined with targeted investment in it and human resources make us reliable on addressing complex projects and meeting our clients' expectations. we have been operating in the italian and international market for more than 20 years , offering customized solutions. bononia skating is an inline skating sports association based in bologna. founded by skating enthusiasts, bononia skating organizes events, courses, and competitions for skaters of all levels. mattia guadagnini, a motocross rider for the red bull ktm factory racing team, is an emerging talent in the world of two-wheel racing.

long_description: its italia s.p.a. is a corporate entity with over 20 years of experience in the mechanical component industry, dealing with various products such as bushings, bearings, linear guides, road ends and much else. tailor made solutions are one of its italia s.p.a.'s strengths, as it can provide its customers with products for specific applications through the study of special components. in 2016, its italia s.p.a. expanded its operations directly on chinese territory by opening a representative office in shanghai, which in may 2019 became shanghai jfk bearing co., ltd, a fully-fledged company.
